citaty.text: Success is the child of audacity
citaty.author: Benjamin Disraeli

citaty.text: Success is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration
citaty.author: Thomas Edison

citaty.text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm
citaty.author: Winston Churchill

citaty.text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change
citaty.author: Charles Darwin

citaty.text: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence
citaty.author: Confucius

citaty.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success
citaty.author: Herman Cain

citaty.text: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going
citaty.author: Helen Keller

citaty.text: Fall seven times and stand up eight
citaty.author: Japanese Proverb

citaty.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become
citaty.author: Buddha

citaty.text: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That’s my religion
citaty.author: Abraham Lincoln
